title: Which K-Pop group leader that are also the maknae (youngest member) in their group? And how they lead their group, because South Korea is a country that really respect the seniority? - Quora

response.answer_text: The only one I can think of is Winner’s Seungyoon. He actually wasn’t originally the maknae, their actual maknae Nam Taehyun left the group. As far as I see, the other members do acknowledge him as the leader. He was appointed leader for a reason and the other members respect that. Yes seniority is important in Korean culture, age order is an important part of that, but the Leader title does trump age.
